author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
The other day I put out a video on sudo-rs and I saw a few people complaining about moving from sudo to sudo-rs is a move from GPL to MIT software, but the reality of the situation is that sudo never used a GPL style license.

title: Setting The Record Straight On Linux Sudo
